name: Dark room ver 0.2.0
description:
This game is not finished yet and the story comes to me while developing

all i can tell you is that it's text based and you have to try it out for yourself

I'll be developing this in my spare time

This game is perfect for the lowest of low end because its text based

The supporter edition includes the game icon in .ico and .png

The Developer/mod maker edition contains the game icon and the source code
